mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into genetic_history (id, psychosis, dementia, malformation, geneticdisease, psychosisdescribe, dementiadescribe, malformationdescribe, geneticdiseasedescribe) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{psychosis,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{dementia,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{malformation,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{geneticdisease,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{psychosisdescribe,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{dementiadescribe,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{malformationdescribe,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{geneticdiseasedescribe,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update genetic_history set psychosis = #{psychosis,jdbcType=CHAR}, dementia = #{dementia,jdbcType=CHAR}, malformation = #{malformation,jdbcType=CHAR}, geneticdisease = #{geneticdisease,jdbcType=CHAR}, psychosisdescribe = #{psychosisdescribe,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, dementiadescribe = #{dementiadescribe,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, malformationdescribe = #{malformationdescribe,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, geneticdiseasedescribe = #{geneticdiseasedescribe,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, psychosis, dementia, malformation, geneticdisease, psychosisdescribe, dementiadescribe, malformationdescribe, geneticdiseasedescribe from genetic_history where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, psychosis, dementia, malformation, geneticdisease, psychosisdescribe, dementiadescribe, malformationdescribe, geneticdiseasedescribe from genetic_history
